biotools.summary: Program to predict genes by comparing anonymous genomic sequences from different species. It combines tblastx, a sequence similarity search program, with geneid, an ab initio gene prediction program.

bioschemas.name: SGP2
bioschemas.summary: Program to predict genes by comparing anonymous genomic sequences from different species. It combines tblastx, a sequence similarity search program, with geneid, an ab initio gene prediction program.
